Reviews.Title: AWESOME but with one minor flaw.
Reviews.Author: josh
Reviews.Content: It's a great phone don't doubt it. I did some research online, watched some reviews on this phone and I got everything I expected except the phone charger cable.  I was really disappointing and so I had to order a cable separately. Other then that, everything's fine, the phone looks nice, and even had some extra juice for me to turn it on without charging. The UI looks a bit complicated for flip phones, but hey :) It's Japan. Would rate 5/5, fast delivery, safe packaging and all.

Reviews.Title: arrived perfect
Reviews.Author: antonio
Reviews.Content: i loveeee this phone. works perfect, only bad thing is that it does not include charger or microo sd card

ProductInfo.Features:
Available from US sellers
Multi Color Notification Lights / Eco-Modes to conserve battery life and also a new one touch Bright mode, when in dark areas
5 Megapixel HD Camera (1932 × 2576 pixels max picture taking resolution)
HD Video Recording (1280 × 720 video capture in 720P resolution)
GSM GPRS EDGE  850, 900, 1800, 1900 MHz. UMTS HSDPA  800, 850, 1700, 2100 MHz. *Micro sim card*
ProductInfo.Name: Docomo SHARP SH-03E Waterproof Cell Phone Black (Unlocked)
